title: Bookjacket Design, "Bookcover for "God's Own Junkyard, The Planned Deterioration of America's Landscape" by Peter Blake", 1963
medium: Lithography in black and red ink on off-white glossy paper
inscribed:
Imprinted vertically in lower right corner in black: Elaine Lustig
Imprinted across top in red ink: God's Own Junkyard/ (in black ink) The Planned Deterioration of America's Landscape
At upper right, below title in black ink: PETER BLAKE
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Cover for the book "God's Own Junkyard, The Planned Deterioration of America's Landscape." On the lover three quarters of the cover are images of billboards, telephone poles, signage, trees, and highways.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket Design, "Bookcover for "God's Own Junkyard, The Planned Deterioration of America's Landscape" by Peter Blake", 1963.
1963. Lithography in black and red ink on off-white glossy paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-58.
